attributes.action: Stop prostitution on southcote road, bournemouth, dorset
attributes.additional_details: because the local council, and police don't do anything about this.
attributes.background: stop the local drug users, and alcoholics using southcote road for prostitution.

rejection.details:
Decisions about local policing and tackling anti-social behaviour are a matter for your local authority and local police force, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you have witnessed a crime you should report this to the police: https://www.police.uk/pu/contact-the-police/report-a-crime-incident/

If you have witnessed anti-social behaviour you can report this to Bournemouth Council here: https://www.bournemouth.gov.uk/Housing/YourCouncilTenancy/Anti-SocialBehaviour.aspx
